message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. I believe it's a great deal for you, considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $13,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $13,750?  I'm confident this price is fair for both of us.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I would like to counteroffer at $13,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
